title: Koi Nami chroma Splash arts

embed.description: DISCLAIMER AT BOTTOM::: I wanted to make another chroma splash again and this time experimented with Koi nami I don't have this skin but I really love the splash art for it and wanted to see how it looked with the purple chroma instead.

body:
Hi guys!
So seeing as my Golden Ashe Chroma splash edit was well received I decided to try again with
another of my favourite skin's chroma's. This time it's Koi Nami

I started off with the Purple version (All lulu mains know why purple comes first)
After finishing the colour palate swap I had to change the background because for whatever
reason purple didn't like the original so I went with a sunset.

After adding in the glows and some extra effects to give it a nice fantasy like feeling while still trying to keep
to it's oriental look I got what you see here https://www.artstation.com/artwork/3z68E

I also was nice enough to make the yellow one as well
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/4OWqq

I really hope you like them, I'm still new to this so they may not be the best but I will get better.
If you have a chroma you want to see made into the splash or me to make a custom one of your choice out
of existing splashes please let me know {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: I wanna see a chroma version of mecha sion please, It will be good if it's similar to transformers.(Bumblebee/Optimus Prime/Megatron).
